metadata.title: CVE-2024-26695 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: crypto:ccp - Fix null pointer dereference in __sev_platform_shutdown_locked TheSEV platform device can be shutdown with a null psp_master, e.g., usingDEBUG_TEST_DRIVER_REMOVE.
